name: Traffic Cop 3D
description:
Pullover and enjoy the ride of your life, in Traffic Cop 3D.

Cruise along the streets, keeping a keen eye out for trouble. Use your scanner to look at the cars around you, and spot who is breaking the law. Us your best judgment to decide if you should pull them over to arrest them, or let them go yourself.

Have you got what it takes?

Traffic Cop 3D features:
-Be a cop!
-Catch crooks
-Drive a cop car!
